mapper.select: select mem_num, mem_name, mem_id, mem_img from userinteraction, member where ui_member=#{mem_num} and ui_friend=mem_num order by mem_name
select art_num, art_name, art_img from artist, userinteraction where ui_member=#{mem_num} and ui_type='liked_artist' and ui_artist=art_num order by ui_num desc

select con_num, con_name, con_poster, con_startdate, con_enddate, con_venue, chall_name venuename from concert, concerthall, userinteraction where ui_member=#{mem_num} and ui_type='liked_concert' and ui_concert=con_num and con_venue=chall_num order by ui_num desc
